text: Aagam Prasad Bantawa Rai (Nepali: अगम प्रसाद वान्तवा राई) is a Nepalese communist politician and member of the National Assembly. In 2018 he was elected in Province No. 1 for the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist–Leninist) with a four-year term. == References == Category:Nepal Communist Party (NCP) politicians Category:Members of the National Assembly (Nepal) Category:Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist–Leninist) politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Aagam Prasad Bantawa Rai
